name: Heat of the Moment
description:
'Heat of the Moment' is a lighthearted detective game set during a heatwave.  Solve, or even prevent, a murder using just your wits and your superior sense of smell.

Created for the Heatwave-themed June/July Jackpot Jam. Programmed in Delphi RAD Studio by H.H. Magoo.  Music composed in MuseScore3 by Brother Kies . We are Gopher Games.
